query:
SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'companies', COUNT(*) FROM companies
UNION ALL
SELECT 'courses', COUNT(*) FROM courses
UNION ALL
SELECT 'topics', COUNT(*) FROM topics
UNION ALL
SELECT 'questions', COUNT(*) FROM questions;
